Reviews.Title: Very serviceable phone
Reviews.Author: Jaylectricity "Jaylectricity"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as an exact replacement to one I had put through the washer. It's a simple flip phone, no internet or email. The reason I stuck with it was to avoid having to purchase a data plan through my carrier.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone
Reviews.Author: Denise A Mooney
Reviews.Content: The phone was a really good deal. It was perfect for what I bought it for - not a lot of apps available but then again it's not a smart phone. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a starter phone or who wants a basic phone for young children.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Hettenhouser
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to put on my Verizon contract it works great, had minor problem with battery seller took care of issue in fast manner. Over all I love this phone.  Thank you for the great service I will recommend family and friends to you.

Reviews.Title: Disapointment
Reviews.Author: Teryl, like Cheryl but with a T!
Reviews.Content: The camera does not work well....my pic's can not be navigated through...does not have Motorola & Verizon icon/logo on the inside...I was rather disappointed with this purchase...the camera is the biggest issue...does not work....pic's are dark...BASICALLY USELESS!

Reviews.Title: Pass On This One
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: Sound quality on the phone is poor.  Would not purchase again.  $21.00.  You get what you pay for.  The only good part is not having to renew for another 2 years with Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: K&k; "K&k;"
Reviews.Content: My 93 yr old father wore the last one out and we needed another identical to it so he wouldn't have to re-learn anything.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: software out of date
Reviews.Author: william saunders
Reviews.Content: the phone is great but verison won't suport its softwarethis means its features are limited so what else is new

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Two nearly dead and not holding a charge batteries were sent with this phone. There was nothing in the ad stating we'd need to buy a battery too.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Purchaser
Reviews.Content: Nice phone in great condition.  This is a steal for a price of under twenty bucks.  Any flip phone I have purchased in the past for a similar price has not been near as nice as these.

Reviews.Title: Slow Moving
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Barbaro
Reviews.Content: The phone takes time to turn on and I have trouble with the number 9 key.  I am switching back to my old phone.

Reviews.Title: works only slightly better than the old one
Reviews.Author: Roger A Povich
Reviews.Content: it LOOKS brand new, but works anything BUT NEW. I push a button and the screen skips to 5 different screens. i take a picture and it automatically goes to 2 different screens. it does what it wants to do, then i have to go back and correct the entry, to where I WANT IT to be. a piece of crap phone.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: steve landau
Reviews.Content: Very appreciative and it is what my phone store recommended--will do it again.  No hesitation at all and a tremendous value.

Reviews.Title: Favorite flip phone except for the battery
Reviews.Author: D. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I'm not a fan of touch screen phones at all.  I like having actual buttons to press--it makes texting and things so much easier which is why I've stuck with flip phones.  Of all the flip phones I've owned, this has been my favorite one.  I love the modern, stylish look of it and how easy it is to use.  However, the battery life on this thing is terrible.  After using it for about ten or twenty minutes during the day, the battery meter drops down a bar or two.  If you take a picture or someone sends you a picture message, it uses the battery up even faster.  By the end of the day it usually only has one or two bars of battery life left.  At first I thought the battery was the problem so I bought a new one, but nope, same thing happened.  The phone uses so much power that you have to charge the battery every day or sometimes twice a day depending on how much you use it.  I owned an LG Accolade before this one and the battery on it lasted forever-- I could go three or four days before I had to charge it.  I'm hoping Motorola makes a new version of this phone that doesn't use up the battery so fast.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTO W755 MP3 - Verizon or PagePlus
